name: Synthia in the Cyber Crypt [Commodore 64]
description:
THIS GAME WORKS ON PAL / NTSC MACHINES

Synthia in the Cyber Crypt is an epic platform puzzler, created in SEUCK with additional programming by Eleanor Burns. It is also the official winner of the Official C64 SEUCK Compo 2020

Humanity is doomed. The scientists who had been working on AI replacements to
help the survivors of the atomic war have been killed by their latest model. One obsolete HEC-80 is our last hope.

Control HEC-80 with joystick in either port. Go around each room, picking up objects (which will reappear) in order to solve a clue/obstacle in specific rooms. The objects are placed around each screen, and cannot be lost. Simply remember what they are, where they are and try to use what you have picked up using the fire button.

Can HEC-80 save the world?

Credits

Game design, graphics, and sound effects by Eleanor Burns
Additional programming enhancements by Eleanor Burns
Front end programming, password system and enhancements by Richard Bayliss
Tape Loader by Martin Piper and Richard Bayliss

(C)2020  Eleanor Burns for The New Dimension
